title.rendered: CELEBRATING MEN! FATHER’S DAY GIFT IDEAS

content.rendered:
D’Lashes Favorites for Father’s Day + Gifts For Men
We are celebrating all the amazing men out there! Here at D’Lashes we offer lash extensions for women as well as men. We have so many men clients who want thicker fuller lashes, and here at D’Lashes we provide natural looking lashes based specifically on the client needs. To book your lash appointment click here DLASHES.COM 

Here are my top favorite gift ideas for all the fabulous men in your life. 1 Alexa from Amazon.com  2 Lash Extension for Men from DLASHES.COM 3 Spicebomb from Viktor & Rolf 4 The New Echo Show from Amazon.com 5 Classic Vans Sneakers 6 Prada Fragrance for Men  7 New Kiehl’s Age Defender Moisturizer for Men 

LOVE DIONNE
